physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Colonoscopy demonstrated ileitis and a stricture 2 cm proximal to the ileocecal valve. Histological examination of an ileal biopsy showed chronic, focally active ileitis.
Patient reports intermittent abdominal pain that has worsened over time.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Pain worsened after an initial course of treatment with omeprazole, then temporary improvement with budesonide before the return of pain.
